ref.mixed-citation: Shangke huizuan 傷科彙纂 (1815), by Hu Tingguang 胡廷光 (fl. 18 th cent.);12.629, in Xuxiu, fasc. 1017. On his treating of traumatic injuries see also Wu Yi-li, “Between the Living and the Dead: Trauma Medicine and Forensic Medicine in the Mid-Qing”, Frontiers of History in China 2015;10.1:38-73. doi: 10.3868/s020-004-015-0002-0. Accessed on 22 Mar 2020.
